invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password_max_length: Password cannot be over 50 characters long.
password_requirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one digit.
first_name_too_short: First name must be at least 3 characters long.
first_name_too_long: First name cannot be over 50 characters long.
last_name_too_short: Last name must be at least 3 characters long.
last_name_too_long: Last name cannot be over 50 characters long.
invalid_phone: Please provide a valid phone number without the country code and empty spaces.
welcome: Welcome! Please continue by signing in to your new account.
click_to_see_times: Click a date in calendar to see appointment times.
no_available_times_left: No available times left for this day
please_check_information: Please check that the information is correct. You will receive a confirmation email to
booking_confirmed: Your booking is confirmed. A confirmation email was sent to
click_appointment_to_select: Click an appointment to select it. Appointment must be booked at least one hour before start time.
name: Name
click_send_to_change_receive_link: Type your email address and click Send to receive an email with intructions to change your password.
